content: CI servers will be taken down for maintenance in 1 hour, from 2pm to 4pm UTC+0.
Looks like I'm gonna need an additional 40 minutes. Also the mere act of plugging in an extra ssd caused my windows boot to break, I couldn't make this stuff up.
Now I just need to setup the github tokens with Richard.
Looks like everything is working, if you add something right now it may take a while to start, the servers are working through the job queue.
I'm going to do a quick restart of the servers to check if all needed services start automatically.
